ddf.catalog.federation.base

Class AbstractFederationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.federation.base.AbstractFederationStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FederationStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortedFederationStrategy

    public abstract class AbstractFederationStrategy
extends Object
implements FederationStrategy
    This class serves as a base implementation of the FederationStrategy interface. Other classes can extend this class to create specific attributes to sort by.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<PostFederatedQueryPlugin> postQuery
      The List of post-federated query plugins to execute on the query request after the query is executed on the Source.
      protected List<PreFederatedQueryPlugin> preQuery
      The List of pre-federated query plugins to execute on the query request before the query is executed on the Source.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractFederationStrategy(ExecutorService queryExecutorService)
      Deprecated. 
      - only to provide support for deprecated FifoFederationStrategy and SortedFederationStrategy
      AbstractFederationStrategy(ExecutorService queryExecutorService, List<PreFederatedQueryPlugin> preQuery, List<PostFederatedQueryPlugin> postQuery)
      Instantiates an AbstractFederationStrategy with the provided ExecutorService.

      • federate

        public QueryResponse federate(List<Source> sources,
                              QueryRequest queryRequest)
        Description copied from interface: FederationStrategy
        Federate the given query to the List of Sources, returning a QueryResponse back to the user that will include the matching Results.
        Specified by:
        federate in interface FederationStrategy
        Parameters:
        sources - the List of Sources to be queried. Cannot be null or empty.
        queryRequest - the QueryRequest to execute. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        QueryResponse which contains the list of Results.

      • setMaxStartIndex

        public void setMaxStartIndex(int maxStartIndex)
        To be set via Spring/Blueprint
        Parameters:
        maxStartIndex - the new default max start index value
